entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
